title.en: My Bear-Like Junior Tells Me "I Love You" Once a Day

altTitles.ja: コワモテ後輩が一日一回好きって言ってくる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kowamote Kouhai ga Ichinichi Ikkai Suki tte Itte Kuru

altTitles.en: A Daily "I Love You" From a Beastly Junior

description.en:
Every day, Haru Inui (27) goes hard in both her personal and professional lives. And every day, her boyfriend tells her that he loves her. Those words alone give Haru the strength to work hard -- until the day she discovers that her boyfriend has been bringing other women to her house when she isn't around. How could she have believed his simple "I love you"s?! Haru feels like an idiot... when suddenly, her junior at work, Okuma, tells her that he has feelings for her! Determined to win her heart, Okuma promises to tell Haru, who doesn't believe in those three little words anymore, that loves her once a day, every day. Seemingly aloof, Okuma turns out to be unexpectedly bold! Haru doesn't know when, and she doesn't know where, but Okuma's surprising daily "I love you"s quickly turn into the office romance she didn't know she needed. 

(Source: Mangaplaza, official)
description.ja: プライベートも仕事もハードモードで頑張る犬井ハル２７歳。彼氏から言われる『大好きだよ』の言葉が心の支えだったが、ある日ハルの家をラブホ代わりに使っていた彼氏と鉢合わせてしまう。信じた自分がバカだったーーそんな、「好き」を信じられなくなったハルに突然告白してきたのは、会社の後輩・大熊。ハルに告白を信じてもらうため大熊がした約束は、一日一回 心から「好き」と伝えることだった。いつどこで「好き」と言われるのか全く分からない、無愛想に見えて意外と大胆なコワモテ後輩・大熊とのオフィスサプライズラブ！

biography.en:
Mangaka. Not to be confused with the the web comic artist [Kazuki (かずき)](https://mangadex.org/author/4e05418d-243a-48ca-8df3-00002a8f284f), the het H-manga artist [Kazuki (かづき)](https://mangadex.org/author/867695db-f1ba-40a2-9743-3b8de2820fac), the BL doujin artist [Kazuki (架月)](https://mangadex.org/author/848d178b-4d69-4cf2-adc7-e37d67f3e6e7), or the non-fiction author [Kazuki (kazuki5)](https://mangadex.org/author/fed01cb9-9038-4b4e-a26e-0748f69146ab).
